author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Bank robber suspect photos released by FBI Denver
text:
Summary by Ground News The event took place at approximately 2:40 p.m. on Dec. 20 at a BMO Bank located at 3102 S. Sheridan Blvd., Denver. The suspect was described as a white or Hispanic male in his 30s with a heavy build. He was wearing a green, John Deere sweatshirt, dark pants, white tennis shoes and a green beanie. Share menu More

KDVR Center High Factuality Media Conglomerate: Nexstar Media Group Media Conglomerate: Tribune Media Bank robber suspect photos released by FBI Denver DENVER (KDVR) -- The Federal Bureau of Investigation Denver and the Denver Police Department released photos of a bank robbery suspect from a Dec. 20 incident in hopes that someone can identify the suspect. The event took place at approximately 2:40 p.m. on Dec. 20 at a BMO Bank located at 3102 S. Sheridan Blvd., Denver. It is now under investigation by the FBI's Rocky Mountain Safe Streets Task Force and Denver police. Boulder police relea…
